rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows and ample natural light.
Spacious minimalist living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the front facade for abundant sunlight. Vastu aligned in north-eastern direction.
Compact and modern kitchen with integrated storage. Positioned to the south as per Vastu guidelines for a balanced flow of energy.
Dedicated servant's room with basic amenities. Located adjacent to the kitchen for efficient service access.

openings.description: Primary entrance ensuring wheelchair accessibility with a ramp and automatic door mechanism.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing abundant natural light and enhancing visual aesthetics.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with a private balcony. Vastu-compliant placement in the north-west corner for harmony.
Spacious secondary bedroom designed with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample light. Placed according to Vastu norms.
Additional bedroom in line with minimalist aesthetics and wheelchair accessibility considerations.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window in the master bedroom to promote natural ventilation and light.
Door leading to a private balcony designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom maintaining minimalist design and Vastu-compliant orientation.
Another secondary bedroom with emphasis on natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows.
Multi-functional study/office space incorporating minimalist design and Vastu guidelines for productivity.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring sufficient natural light for workspace.

rooms.description: A minimalist-designed swimming pool area with safety railings and Vastu-compliant layout.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window overlooking the swimming pool area for aesthetic appeal.

wheelchair_ramps.description: Ramped entrance for wheelchair accessibility at the main entry.

elevators.description: An elevator with adequate space and controls compliant with safety standards.
